author: shazron
msg: Crash fix: navigator.network.isReachable, when using the isIpAddress option.

author: becka11y
msg: Implementation of Directories and Systems File API
Remove/Modify FileMgr JavaScript APIs not specified in any File API spec

- Remove navigator.fileMgr.createDirectory(dirName) function.  To create a directory, use the DirectoryEntry.getDirectory() method, which is part of the File API: Directories and System spec.  Set the Flags.create to 'true':
- Remove navigator.fileMgr.getRootPaths() function.  To retrieve the root file systems, use the window.requestFileSystem() function, which is part of the File API: Directories and System spec.
- Remove navigator.fileMgr.deleteFile(fileName) function.  To delete a file, use the Entry.remove() method, which is part of the File API: Directories and System spec.

- Remove navigator.fileMgr.deleteDirectory(dirName) function.  To delete a directory, use the Entry.remove() (if it is empty), or DirectoryEntry.removeRecursively() methods, which are part of the File API: Directories and System spec.
- Remove navigator.fileMgr.getFileBasePaths() function.  Use the window.requestFileSystem() function.

- Changed implementation of testFileExists() and testDirectoryExists() to require a full  path name (obtainable via window.requestFileSystem()).  Previously these assumed a file name relative to the Documents directory.

author: becka11y
msg: Updates for different callback function types
fixes ticket #121 for non-global named functions. fix rom Jorge Chamorro Bieling.
Updated media.js to call GetFunctionName() on callbacks.
